text: I am not the expert, but I think you can do it in blog settings. Just change domain and add new slug

just a quick question: why does HubSpot use the `http-eqiv` attribute with the value of `content-language`  in the `meta`  of the document head when it is described as a bad practice?
`<meta http-equiv="content-language" content="en">`

Hi Everyone! I don't know where to ask, but i'm facing an issue with a CRM extension. Everytime the modal (iframe action) opens or closes the iframe is refreshed. It is obviously ok when the modal opens, but why the page refreshes the IFRAME on close trigger?

Let's say I have this endpoint for that action: /api/crm_extensions/contacts

Open the modal: one hit to /api/crm_extensions/contacts
Close the modal: second hit to /api/crm_extensions/contacts

Makes no sense. I'm triggering external triggers twice for this reason, but I don't know how to stop this behaviour (I think something broke on HubSpot side, as this doesn't use to happen=
if you add slug "blog" that will change the <http://blog.website.com|blog.website.com> to <http://website.com/blog|website.com/blog>
Hi all, I seem to be plagued by this error in the module editor: "Error: internal error". There is no additional information, and I have no idea where to look for the problem - suggestions?
Hi! I’m trying to pass through UTM variables when a form is submitted via hidden fields on the form. I know I’ve done this previously but I can’t remember how. Please help jog my memory!
